    dcl_2d s2

// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_72C526AC_0.txt

mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    add_pp r0, c3.x, v1.xyxy
    mul_pp r1.xy, r0.zwzw, r0.zwzw
    mad_pp r1.xy, r1, -c3.y, c3.z
    mul_pp r1.xy, r1, r1
    mad_pp r1.xy, r1, -r1, c1.x

    mul r1.xy, r2, c3.w
    exp_pp r2.xz, r1.x

    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0_abs.x, c0.y

    mov r1.zw, c12
    mad r1.yz, v0.xzww, -r1.xzww, r6.xxyw

    rsq r1.y, r1.y

    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, -c3.x

    mad r1.z, c11.w, -r4_abs.x, r4_abs.w
    texld_pp r4, v0.zwzw, s2

    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s4
    lrp_pp r3, r0.y, r1, r2
    add_pp r1, -r3, r5
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r1, r3
